name: Google Search - Darker (grey) background
description: Small modification to Google Search to tone down the white background to a light grey color. Also made a few elements transparent to improve the coherency. Changelog 2015-11-19 1. Domain block links: right align, desaturate and highlight on hover 2015-10-08 1. Made date fields more prominent. 2. Added a (subtle) positional marker for every 5th search result in the left margin. This makes scrolling through longer search results easier. Similar tweaks for: GitHub, Hacker News
